    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentGridTable

        public DocumentGridTable(java.util.List<java.lang.String> allAttributes,
                 java.util.List<Document> allDocs,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> allDocsEnabled)
        Builds table representing all active documents. 1 row-per-doc, 1 col-per-attr. note: Since name, text are (sometimes) attributes (depending on the dataset), we should be careful about adding them twice?
        Parameters:
        allAttributes - names of all attributes in the documents
        allDocs - list of documents to be represented in this table
        allDocsEnabled - mask-like boolean list indicating which docs should be active
